verses.verse: וְלִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei Now the sons יִשָׂשכָ֗ר <S%H3485><s%> yi-so-sh-Char, of Issachar תּוֹלָ֧ע <S%H8439><s%> to-La' [were] Tola וּפוּאָ֛ה <S%H6312><s%> u-fu-'Ah and Puah; יָשִׁיב ya-shiv כיָשׁ֥וּב <S%H3437><s%> ya-Shuv Jashub קוְשִׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8110><s%> ve-shim-Ron and Shimron אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah. four ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons תוֹלָ֗ע <S%H8439><s%> to-La', of Tola עֻזִּ֡י <S%H5813><s%> 'uz-Zi Uzzi וּרְפָיָ֡ה <S%H7509><s%> u-re-fa-Yah and Rephaiah וִֽ֠ירִיאֵל <S%H3400><s%> Vi-ri-'el and Jeriel וְיַחְמַ֨י <S%H3181><s%> ve-yach-Mai and Jahmai וְיִבְשָׂ֜ם <S%H3005><s%> ve-yiv-Sam and Jibsam וּשְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> u-she-mu-'El, and Shemuel רָאשִׁ֤ים <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim heads לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- house אֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam of their father's לְתוֹלָ֔ע <S%H8439><s%> le-to-La', [to wit] of Tola גִּבּ֥וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bo-rei [they were] valiant men חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil of might לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8435><s%> le-to-le-do-Tam; in their generations מִסְפָּרָם֙ <S%H4557><s%> mis-pa-Ram whose number בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei [was] in the days דָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, of David עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <S%H6242><s%> 'es-rim- and twenty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim two אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> ve-Shesh and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons עֻזִּ֖י <S%H5813><s%> 'uz-Zi of Uzzi יִֽזְרַֽחְיָ֑ה <S%H3156><s%> yiz-rach-Yah; Izrahiah וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the sons יִֽזְרַֽחְיָ֗ה <S%H3156><s%> yiz-rach-Yah, of Izrahiah מִֽיכָאֵ֡ל <S%H4317><s%> mi-cha-'El Michael וְ֠עֹבַדְיָה <S%H5662><s%> Ve-'oad-yah and Obadiah וְיוֹאֵ֧ל <S%H3100><s%> ve-yo-'El and Joel יִשִּׁיָּ֛ה <S%H3449><s%> yish-shi-Yah Ishiah חֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five רָאשִׁ֥ים <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim all of them chief men כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam. all

וַעֲלֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H5921><s%> va-'a-lei-Hem by לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֜ם <S%H8435><s%> le-to-le-do-Tam And with them by their generations לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit after the house אֲבוֹתָ֗ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam, of their fathers גְּדוּדֵי֙ <S%H1416><s%> ge-du-Dei [were] bands צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va of soldiers מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah, for war שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim and thirty וְשִׁשָּׁ֖ה <S%H8337><s%> ve-shish-Shah six אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef; thousand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הִרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bu [men] for they had many נָשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim wives וּבָנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nim. and sons

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem, And their brethren לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot among all the families יִשָׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> yi-so-sh-Char, of Issachar גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rei [were] valiant חֲיָלִ֑ים <S%H2428><s%> cha-ya-Lim; men of might שְׁמוֹנִ֤ים <S%H8084><s%> she-mo-Nim fourscore וְשִׁבְעָה֙ <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah and seven אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand הִתְיַחְשָׂ֖ם <S%H3187><s%> hit-yach-Sam reckoned in all by their genealogies לַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> lak-Kol. all manner פ Peh

בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min, [The sons] of Benjamin בֶּ֧לַע <S%H1106><s%> Be-la' Bela וָבֶ֛כֶר <S%H1071><s%> va-Ve-cher and Becher וִידִֽיעֲאֵ֖ל <S%H3043><s%> vi-di-'a-'El and Jediael שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah. three

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons בֶ֗לַע <S%H1106><s%> Ve-la', of Bela אֶצְבּ֡וֹן <S%H675><s%> etz-Bon Ezbon וְעֻזִּ֡י <S%H5813><s%> ve-'uz-Zi and Uzzi וְ֠עֻזִּיאֵל <S%H5816><s%> Ve-'uz-zi-'el and Uzziel וִירִימ֨וֹת <S%H3406><s%> vi-ri-Mot and Jerimoth וְעִירִ֜י <S%H5901><s%> ve-'i-Ri and Iri חֲמִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah, five רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei heads בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house אָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot, of [their] fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rei mighty חֲיָלִ֑ים <S%H2428><s%> cha-ya-Lim; men of valour וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֗ם <S%H3187><s%> ve-hit-yach-Sam, and were reckoned by their genealogies עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim and two אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons בֶ֗כֶר <S%H1071><s%> Ve-cher, of Becher זְמִירָ֡ה <S%H2160><s%> ze-mi-Rah Zemira וְיוֹעָ֡שׁ <S%H3135><s%> ve-yo-'Ash and Joash וֶ֠אֱלִיעֶזֶר <S%H461><s%> Ve-'e-li-'e-zer and Eliezer וְאֶלְיוֹעֵינַ֤י <S%H454><s%> ve-'el-yo-'ei-Nai and Elioenai וְעָמְרִי֙ <S%H6018><s%> ve-'a-me-Ri and Omri וִירֵמ֣וֹת <S%H3406><s%> vi-re-Mot and Jerimoth וַאֲבִיָּ֔ה <S%H29><s%> va-'a-vi-Yah, and Abiah וַעֲנָת֖וֹת <S%H6068><s%> va-'a-na-Tot and Anathoth וְעָלָ֑מֶת <S%H5964><s%> ve-'a-La-met; and Alameth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- All these [are] the sons בָֽכֶר׃ <S%H1071><s%> Va-cher. of Becher

וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֣ם <S%H3187><s%> ve-hit-yach-Sam And the number לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8435><s%> le-to-le-do-Tam, of them after their genealogy by their generations רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei heads בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam, of their fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rei mighty men חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil; of valour עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [was] twenty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> u-ma-Ta-yim. and two hundred ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei The sons יְדִיעֲאֵ֖ל <S%H3043><s%> ye-di-'a-'El also of Jediael בִּלְהָ֑ן <S%H1092><s%> bil-Han; Bilhan וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the sons בִלְהָ֗ן <S%H1092><s%> vil-Han, of Bilhan; יְעִישׁ ye-'ish כיְע֡וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> ye-'Ush Jehush קוּ֠בִנְיָמִן <S%H1144><s%> U-vin-ya-min and Benjamin וְאֵה֤וּד <S%H164><s%> ve-'e-Hud and Ehud וּֽכְנַעֲנָה֙ <S%H3668><s%> u-che-na-'a-Nah and Chenaanah וְזֵיתָ֔ן <S%H2133><s%> ve-zei-Tan, and Zethan וְתַרְשִׁ֖ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> ve-tar-Shish and Tharshish וַאֲחִישָֽׁחַר׃ <S%H300><s%> va-'a-chi-Sha-char. and Ahishahar

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei All these the sons יְדִֽיעֲאֵל֙ <S%H3043><s%> ye-di-'a-'El of Jediael לְרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> le-ra-Shei by the heads הָאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot, of their fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rei mighty חֲיָלִ֑ים <S%H2428><s%> cha-ya-Lim; men of valour שִׁבְעָֽה־ <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'ah- seven עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> 'e-lef thousand וּמָאתַ֔יִם <S%H3967><s%> u-ma-Ta-yim, and two hundred יֹצְאֵ֥י <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Ei [soldiers] fit to go out צָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va for war לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah. [and] battle

וְשֻׁפִּ֤ם <S%H8206><s%> ve-shup-Pim Shuppim וְחֻפִּם֙ <S%H2650><s%> ve-chup-Pim also and Huppim בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children עִ֔יר <S%H5893><s%> 'Ir, of Ir חֻשִׁ֖ם <S%H2366><s%> chu-Shim [and] Hushim בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H313><s%> 'a-Cher. of Aher

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons נַפְתָּלִ֗י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li, of Naphtali יַחֲצִיאֵ֧ל <S%H3185><s%> ya-cha-tzi-'El Jahziel וְגוּנִ֛י <S%H1476><s%> ve-gu-Ni and Guni וְיֵ֥צֶר <S%H3337><s%> ve-Ye-tzer and Jezer וְשַׁלּ֖וּם <S%H7967><s%> ve-shal-Lum and Shallum בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons בִלְהָֽה׃ <S%H1090><s%> vil-Hah. of Bilhah פ Peh

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh אַשְׂרִיאֵ֖ל <S%H844><s%> 'as-ri-'El Ashriel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom יָלָ֑דָה <S%H3205><s%> ya-La-dah; whom she bare פִּֽילַגְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H6370><s%> pi-lag-Sho ([but] his concubine הָֽאֲרַמִּיָּ֔ה <S%H761><s%> ha-'a-ram-mi-Yah, the Aramitess יָלְדָ֕ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מָכִ֖יר <S%H4353><s%> ma-Chir Machir אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. of Gilead

וּמָכִ֞יר <S%H4353><s%> u-ma-Chir And Machir לָקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach took אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah to wife לְחֻפִּ֣ים <S%H2650><s%> le-chup-Pim [the sister] of Huppim וּלְשֻׁפִּ֔ים <S%H8206><s%> u-le-shup-Pim, and Shuppim וְשֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אֲחֹתוֹ֙ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-To whose sister's מַעֲכָ֔ה <S%H4601><s%> ma-'a-Chah, was Maacah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni of the second צְלָפְחָ֑ד <S%H6765><s%> tze-la-fe-Chad; [was] Zelophehad וַתִּהְיֶ֥נָה <S%H1961><s%> vat-tih-Ye-nah had לִצְלָפְחָ֖ד <S%H6765><s%> litz-la-fe-Chad and Zelophehad בָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> ba-Not. had daughters

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led bare מַעֲכָ֤ה <S%H4601><s%> ma-'a-Chah And Maachah אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> 'e-shet- the wife מָכִיר֙ <S%H4353><s%> ma-Chir of Machir בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben, a son וַתִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vat-tik-Ra and she called שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name פֶּ֔רֶשׁ <S%H6570><s%> Pe-resh, Peresh וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv of his brother שָׁ֑רֶשׁ <S%H8329><s%> Sha-resh; [was] Sheresh וּבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav and his sons אוּלָ֥ם <S%H198><s%> 'u-Lam [were] Ulam וָרָֽקֶם׃ <S%H7552><s%> va-Ra-kem. and Rakem

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons אוּלָ֖ם <S%H198><s%> 'u-Lam of Ulam בְּדָ֑ן <S%H917><s%> be-Dan; Bedan אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei These [were] the sons גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מָכִ֖יר <S%H4353><s%> ma-Chir of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh

וַאֲחֹת֖וֹ <S%H269><s%> va-'a-cho-To And his sister הַמֹּלֶ֑כֶת <S%H4447><s%> ham-mo-Le-chet; Hammoleketh יָלְדָה֙ <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִישְׁה֔וֹד <S%H379><s%> ish-Hod, Ishod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲבִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H44><s%> 'a-vi-'E-zer and Abiezer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַחְלָֽה׃ <S%H4244><s%> mach-Lah. and Mahalah

וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the sons שְׁמִידָ֑ע <S%H8061><s%> she-mi-Da'; of Shemida אַחְיָ֣ן <S%H291><s%> 'ach-Yan were Ahian וָשֶׁ֔כֶם <S%H7928><s%> va-She-chem, and Shechem וְלִקְחִ֖י <S%H3949><s%> ve-lik-Chi and Likhi וַאֲנִיעָֽם׃ <S%H593><s%> va-'a-ni-'Am. and Aniam פ Peh

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim שׁוּתָ֑לַח <S%H7803><s%> shu-Ta-lach; Shuthelah וּבֶ֤רֶד <S%H1260><s%> u-Ve-red and Bered בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son וְתַ֣חַת <S%H8480><s%> ve-Ta-chat and Tahath בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, his son וְאֶלְעָדָ֥ה <S%H497><s%> ve-'el-'a-Dah and Eladah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8480><s%> ve-Ta-chat and Tahath בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son
